sub_title: Lecturer at Bachelor's Degree program Applied Physics (The Hague University of Applied Sciences / De Haagse Hogeschool)
summary:
Lecturer in Physics. Subjects: classical mechanics; vibrations and waves; electromagnetism; mathematics; digital signal and image processing; numerical modelling; laboratory work.
Coastal engineer, with particular interest in water waves in relation to their impact on coastal structures (specialties: Wave generation, numerical wave models, laboratory measurements, field measurements)

Master of Science degree in Applied Physics
PhD degree in Technical Mathematics
Master of Arts degree (in Dutch: eerstegraadsbevoegdheid) in teaching Physics and Mathematics

projects.title: Various consultancy projects related to field measurements

contributors.headline: Lecturer at Bachelor's Degree program Applied Physics (The Hague University of Applied Sciences / De Haagse Hogeschool)

projects.title: WTI Hydraulic Loads – Information Need, Field Measurements and Data
projects.description:
This project is part of the cluster Hydraulic Loads within the WTI 2017 program (Wettelijk Toetsinstrumentarium (in dutch), i.e. the National Flood Defence Assessment Tools).
The scope of Ivo Wenneker’s project ‘Information Need, Field Measurements and Data’ is to participate in RWS measurement campaigns by defining their scope and to make the resulting data available, in particular aimed at serving the needs of the WTI 2017 cluster Hydraulic Loads.

contributors.headline: Lecturer at Bachelor's Degree program Applied Physics (The Hague University of Applied Sciences / De Haagse Hogeschool)

projects.title: SWIVT
projects.description: Responsible for the development of SWIVT, a SWAN Instrument for Validation and Testing.

contributors.headline: Lecturer at Bachelor's Degree program Applied Physics (The Hague University of Applied Sciences / De Haagse Hogeschool)

projects.title: Wave generation and installation of wave generators
projects.description:
Ivo Wenneker contributes to the development of AukePC software programs for wave generation in hydraulic facilities and for laboratory wave analysis. Also, he contributes to the development of ARC (Active Reflection Compensation) software.
Ivo Wenneker has been involved in the installation of several of Deltares’ experimental facilities (Delta flume, Delta basin, Scheldt flumes, Atlantic basin, New Delta Flume). This includes specification of the requirements, contacts with contractors during the design & construction phase, and performance tests once that phase is finished.

contributors.headline: Lecturer at Bachelor's Degree program Applied Physics (The Hague University of Applied Sciences / De Haagse Hogeschool)

projects.title: Program manager Hydraulic Structures in Coastal and River Areas
projects.description:
Projectleader and team member of R&D program Hydraulic Structures in Coastal and River Areas (in dutch: Strategisch Onderzoek Waterbouwkundige Constructies). 

Aim is to develop knowledge in the field of detailhydrodynamics (waves and current), coastal structures and river structures, and bring this knowledge to the market.

projects.title: Validation of ComFLOW
projects.description:
Validation of Volume-of-Fluid model ComFLOW for: 
* wave impact on a dike
* wave run-up on a dike

projects.title: TRITON
projects.description:
I worked on several aspects of the Boussinesq-type wave model, including:
* boundary conditions
* coupling to Delft3D to predict short-term morphology

profile_positions.company: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences
profile_positions.description:
I participate(d) in the following courses and activities (all names are in Dutch, appearing in alphabetic order): 
- Afstudeer-begeleiding (4e jaar)
- Digitale Signaalbewerking (hoorcollege en computer-practicum) (4e jaar)
- Mechanica 1, 2 en 3 (hoorcollege, laboratorium-practicum en simulatiepracticum) (1e jaar)
- Trillingen en golven (hoorcollege en laboratorium-practicum) (1e jaar)
- Metrologie 1 en 2 (laboratorium-practicum) (1e en 2e jaar)
- Modelleren (hoorcollege en computer-practicum) (2e jaar)
- Onderzoeken 1, 2 en 3 (projecten in laboratorium) (1e en 2e jaar)
- Optica 1 (hoorcollege en practicum) (1e jaar)
- Stage-begeleiding (3e jaar)
- Studenten loopbaan begeleiding (1e en 2e jaar)
- Wiskunde 1 en 2 (hoorcollege) (1e jaar)
profile_positions.title: Lecturer at Bachelor's Degree program Engineering Physics

profile_positions.description: I teach physics and mathematics at the Haags Montessori Lyceum to fourth and fifth year havo- and vwo-students
profile_positions.title: High school Physics and Mathematics Teacher

profile_positions.description: I decided to start a second MSc study to acquire the necessary skills and certificates to become a first-grade (eerstegraads docent) high-school (level: havo and vwo) school teacher in physics.This MSc is conducted at ICLON (interfacultair centrum voor lerarenopleiding, onderwijsontwikkeling en nascholing), which is part of Leiden University.
profile_positions.title: MSc Student Teacher Physics

profile_positions.description: I participate in several projects, both as team member and project leader.
profile_positions.title: Senior researcher/advisor coastal structures and waves

profile_positions.description: I developed a novel method to compute fluid flows (both compressible and incompressible) using so-called unstructured staggered grids. This work has resulted in a PhD thesis. A link to this thesis can be found in the list of publications on this LinkedIn site.
profile_positions.title: PhD student
